Package com.opentok.cloud.controller.connection

Contains classes related to OpenTok connections.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection
    Represents a connection to the OpenTok session.
    ConnectionEvent
    Defines properties related to ConnectionListener events.
    ConnectionListener
    An event listener for connection-related events in the session.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Connection.Reason
    Specifies values for the reason parameter of the SessionListener.onSessionDisconnected() and ConnectionListener.onConnectionDestroyed() methods.

Package com.opentok.cloud.controller.connection Description

Contains classes related to OpenTok connections.
